name: Demon Slayer
description: Tanjiro Kamado joins the Demon Slayer Corps to avenge his family and cure his sister, who has turned into a demon.

name: One Piece
description: Monkey D. Luffy sets sail with his crew in search of the legendary treasure, the One Piece, to become the Pirate King.

name: Attack on Titan
description: Eren Yeager and his friends join the Scout Regiment to fight against giant humanoid Titans threatening humanity.

name: My Hero Academia
description: In a world of quirks, Izuku Midoriya strives to become the number one hero despite being born powerless.

name: One Punch Man
description: Saitama can defeat any opponent with a single punch, but his unmatched power leaves him bored and seeking challenge.

name: Berserk
description: Guts, a lone mercenary, battles through a nightmarish medieval world seeking revenge against his former friend Griffith.

name: Jujutsu Kaisen
description: Yuji Itadori becomes a Jujutsu sorcerer to battle curses after consuming a powerful cursed object.

name: Tokyo Ghoul
description: Ken Kaneki becomes half-ghoul and must navigate a brutal world between humans and flesh-eating ghouls.

name: Vinland Saga
description: Thorfinn seeks revenge and redemption during the Viking era in this powerful story of war and growth.

name: Chainsaw Man
description: Denji becomes Chainsaw Man, a devil hunter with the power to tear through evil with chainsaw limbs.

name: Death Note
description: Light Yagami gains a notebook that allows him to kill anyone and becomes a vigilante known as Kira.

name: Parasyte: The Maxim
description: Shinichi Izumi fights for control of his body against a parasite trying to take over his brain.

name: Erased
description: A man with time-travel powers must prevent a childhood classmateâ€™s abduction and murder.

name: Code Geass
description: Lelouch gains a mysterious power and starts a rebellion against a tyrannical empire using strategic warfare.

name: Mob Psycho 100
description: Mob is a psychic teenager trying to live a normal life while dealing with dangerous spirits and emotional turmoil.

name: Hunter x Hunter
description: Gon Freecss embarks on a journey to become a Hunter and find his missing father, facing dangerous challenges along the way.

name: Junji Ito Collection
description: An anthology of unsettling and bizarre horror stories from the twisted mind of Junji Ito.
